title: What is a website? Introduction to HTML and Git
description: Introduction to the properties and styles of HTML elements.  Interactive exercises for building simple lists and forms.  Includes an introduction to the version control system Git.

title: Let's get stylish
description: Introduction to the use of Cascading Style Sheets to apply styles to your webpage.  Includes a description of different style properties, the Box Model, and page layout.

title: Getting Functional: An Introduction to JavaScript
description: An introduction to JavaScript functionality for web development.  We'll cover variable types (numeric, string, array, object, function), and explore more complex functionality for arrays

title: Intro to jQuery
description: jQuery is a JavaScript library that makes adding, removing, and manipulating HTML elements much easier.

title: Mobile first: how to design for mobile with Bootstrap
description: Designing with the mobile experience as a first priority has become an industry standard.  We'll learn how to use the Bootstrap library to build beautiful mobile experiences that are easily configurable for larger screen sizes.

title: Building interactive maps with Leaflet.js
description: Interactive maps are a great web feature for navigation, data visualization, and other purposes.  In this lecture, we'll use the leaflet.js library to create interactive maps.

title: Dynamic web applications: Angular, Part I
description: In this first of 2 lectures, we'll explore how Angular.js provides a rich framework for developing robust web applications.  We'll cover the use of angular expressions and directive to leverage a Model-View-Controller architecture to build your web content.

title: Building forms, Using APIs: Angular, Part II
description: We'll review the core functionalities of Angular (directives, expressions), as well as the fundamental principles (M-V-C architecture).  Then, we'll use conditional formatting to build helpful forms, and use these skills in an App driven by the Spotify API.

title: Building Interactive Visualizations: D3.js, Part I
Building Interactive Visualizations: D3.js, Part II
